attributes.action: Silvana S. Lowry & Glenn R. Lowry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please Mr. Brown return savings to depositors of Kaupting Bank, in the Isle Of Man. We are not British citizens but, like our brothers and sisters in Britain you have frozen our assets and the money we have saved for our retirment

rejection.details: Unfortunately, petitions from non-British citizens cannot be accepted.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
